item.title: new toy: 7-color e-ink display
item.description: After considerable to and fro I finally ordered a 7-color e-ink 1 display for the raspberry pi from pimoroni 2. With the help of the official repository 3 putting images on the the display is quite easy. The repository also has code for other e-ink-displays from pimoroni. inky impressions display showing a photograph of paris With about 85mm x 115mm it is comparable to typical e-reader display sizes.

item.title: hifiberry_and_mpd_on_raspberry_pi
item.description: I set up my Raspberry Pi 4 with Arch Linux 1.
